items.title: Undergrad Course Calendar
items.description: The complete list of every program and every course currently offered at Carleton University.

items.title: New Student Check-list
items.description: A checklist for new Carleton Students including information on registering for courses.

items.title: Dates and Deadlines
items.description: A list of all upcoming academic calendar deadlines including course registration dates.

items.title: Time Tickets
items.description: Your time ticket is the date and time that you can register for courses. Take a look at this page for all frequently asked questions about time-tickets.

items.title: Planning your Term
items.description: A guide for course registration regarding the value of credits and overloading your schedule.

items.title: Registration Steps
items.description: A guide on how to navigate and build your time table in Carleton Central.

items.title: Registration Video
items.description: A video guide showing you how to navigate and build your time table in Carleton Central.

items.title: CGPA Info
items.description: An explanation of how Carletons Cumulative Grade Point Average (CGPA) scale works.
